snippet: Apollo Global Management reported a 23 percent jump in first-quarter profit, benefiting from a rise in fees that was driven in part by acquisitions of other investment firms.
abstract: Apollo Global Management reported a 23 percent jump in first-quarter profit, benefiting from a rise in fees that was driven in part by acquisitions of other investment firms.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Apollo's Profit Jumps 23% in First Quarter
